testcase.brief: Config single "to" policy from ethx to ethx
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: -PC1 has been associated with AP1 and assigned an ip address
Test Procedure: 1) PC1 and PC2 ping each other 2) Configure a ip policy and bind it to FW: "ip-policy FW" "ip-policy FW to <pc1 ip addr> action [permit/deny]" "user-profile FW security ip-policy to-access FW" "ssid <ssid_name> default-user-profile-attr [num]" 3) Repeat step 1

step.desc: -PC1 has been associated with AP1 and assigned an ip address
step.console: -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning enable" -v "user-profile ttt qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan1} attribute 1"

step.desc: 2) Configure a ip policy and bind it to FW: "ip-policy FW" "ip-policy FW to <pc1 ip addr> action [permit/deny]" "user-profile FW security ip-policy to-access FW" "ssid <ssid_name> default-user-profile-attr [num]"
step.telnet: -v "ip-policy FW" -v "ip-policy FW id 1 to ${bpc1.tif.ip} action permit" -v "user-profile ttt security ip-policy to-access FW" -v "clear forwarding-engine ip-sessions" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_ff src-ip ${bpc1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "clear log all" -v "cons page 0"

step.log-match: -b "\(\!\) eth1 ${bpc1.tif.ip}->${tb.server1}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -ps p "ACL: matched upid \[\d+\] dir \[ingress \(from-air\)\] upid default action \[deny\]" -e "\(i\) eth1 ${bpc1.tif.ip}->${tb.server1}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

-b "\(o\) eth1 ${tb.server1}->${bpc1.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -ps p "ACL: matched upid \[1\] dir \[egress \(to-air\)\] group \[FW\] id \[1\] \[permit\]" -e "\(i\) eth0 ${tb.server1}->${bpc1.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: Configure a ip-policy which deny Laptop2's ip-address on MP and bind it to FW
step.telnet: -v "ip-policy FW id 1 to ${bpc1.tif.ip} action deny" -v "clear forwarding-engine ip-sessions" -v "clear log all"

step.log-match: -b "\(\!\) eth1 ${bpc1.tif.ip}->${tb.server1}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -ps p "ACL: matched upid \[\d+\] dir \[ingress \(from-air\)\] upid default action \[deny\]" -e "\(i\) eth1 ${bpc1.tif.ip}->${tb.server1}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

-b "\(\!\) eth0 ${tb.server1}->${bpc1.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -ps p "ACL: matched upid \[1\] dir \[egress \(to-air\)\] group \[FW\] id \[1\] \[deny\]" -e "\(i\) eth0 ${tb.server1}->${bpc1.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: kill process which run in background.
